title: Chop Shop Store
content:
Hey, I’m new to this place. I posted about some new Chops on my blog, but do people generally post there and here? Seems the forum is the place to really post your diggs.

I also can’t seem to get the images to run in-line with the post. How does one do that? Is it simply a size requirement? It always just attaches as a link instead of a visual.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [onesheet\_gwmf\_sml.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012195910/http:/typophile.com/files/onesheet_gwmf_sml.jpg) | 137.11 KB |
author: chopshop

comments.content: cool… thanks, but i cannot see how you did that. i only have “edit” buttons on my posts. maybe if you put the embed in `` tags. many of these programs use that as a way to post code without it being read as code.

Immediately below the comment text input box, you should see the "Insert image" link. That will bring up a file dialog from which you can locate the image file on your computer. It will upload it and insert the appropriate tags into your comment.

The "attach file" allows you to upload any file type, but that feature is only available to the originator of the thread (in the case of this one, that's you chopshop), and they all group in a list below the first post. you can add more files later with the "edit" link on the top of the thread.

oh… i just didn't see there were two ways to upload something. thanks!

www.grodzki.com

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012195910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_5563.jpg)
  
it works!
